definition: A female domesticated feline animal, typically referred to in relation to its reproductive capabilities.

examples.german: Die Kätzin spielt mit ihrem Jungen.
examples.english: The female cat is playing with her kitten.
The female cat is chasing a mouse.

examples.german: Die Kätzin schnurrt, wenn sie gestreichelt wird.
examples.english: The female cat purrs when she is petted.

examples.german: Die Kätzin klettert geschickt auf den Baum.
examples.english: The female cat climbs skillfully up the tree.
The female cat has green eyes.
